summary: This is an email correspondence dated August 12, 2019, regarding a chronological log for Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration. It notes an administrative error where the wrong logbook (I/M companion log) was used instead of the required Staff Suicide Watch log for Epstein on July 23-24, 2019, and that a second, corrected log was completed.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the suicide watch log discrepancy; identified by his registration number 73618-054.

persons.name: DTS
persons.context: The individual who discovered the wrong logbook (I/M companion log) was being used for Epstein's suicide watch.

persons.name: Associate Warden
persons.context: Recipient or subject of the confidential communication regarding the log discrepancy.

connections.description: DTS was involved in monitoring Epstein's status, specifically discovering an error in the logbook used for his suicide watch.
The Associate Warden is being informed about a procedural error concerning the logging of Epstein's suicide watch.

events.title: Suicide Watch Logging Period Begins
events.description: The period for which a staff suicide watch log was required for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Suicide Watch Logging Period Ends
events.description: The end of the period for which a staff suicide watch log was required for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Log Discrepancy Reported
events.description: An email is sent reporting that the wrong logbook (I/M companion log) was used for Epstein's suicide watch on July 23-24, and that a second, corrected log was completed.

keyFacts: An administrative error occurred where the 'I/M companion log' was used instead of the official 'Staff Suicide Watch log' for Jeffrey Epstein on July 23-24, 2019.
The error was discovered by an individual identified as DTS, who then completed a second, corrected log using the proper Suicide Watch logbook.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and pertains to internal jail procedures shortly before Epstein's death.
